source_objects.description: Master new forms of publishing from e-books to kindle publishing or writing blogs.
source_objects.title: Media

items.title: MUSIC LICENSING FOR FILMS, TV, VIDEO GAMES AND WEB
items.headline: What a Producer Should Know
objectives_summary: Master the process of licensing songs to films, TV series, video games, web videos, etc.
Understand all the elements you must consider when contacting rights owners.
Identifying all the options you have when it comes to selecting the music you need.

items.title: Create eBook Covers That Pop Using Powerpoint
items.headline: Gain control over your covers & publish faster with this step by step guide to creating great covers with Powerpoint.
objectives_summary: Understand the elements of a great cover
Assemble the components required for a great cover, using free resources
Create an effective and compelling ebook cover using Powerpoint

items.title: How to Turn any HD Video into a Kindle Book in one day

visible_instructors.name: Philip
visible_instructors.title: Philip Viljoen
visible_instructors.job_title: Building Contractor, Author, Coach & Software Instructor

items.headline: The Step by Step Guide to turn any HD Video into a Kindle book. Then upload and sell on KDP Select.
objectives_summary: Find a HD video to Convert
Get the permission if not your own video
Find the outsourcer to use for Audio transcription

items.title: Self Publishing Secrets
items.headline: How to Self Publish a Print on Demand Book to Amazon For Free Using CreateSpace
objectives_summary: Discover how to publish a paperback book to Amazon for FREE in less than 60 minutes...even if you've never been published before!
Learn how to order unlimited copies of your book at a wholesale price at CreateSpace.com.
"Double dip" on your Amazon book royalties by publishing the very same book to Kindle ebbok and paperback format.

items.title: Self-Produce a High-Quality Audiobook on a Budget
items.headline: Learn how to make audiobooks at home!
objectives_summary: Audiobook Production
Audio Engineering
Speaking Skills

items.title: Complete Video Production for Businesses, Bloggers & Tutors

visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Kilkelly
visible_instructors.job_title: Video Business Owner and Former University Tutor

items.headline: Become a master of the most engaging form on media on the web and use it to build a loyal audience. No fluff, no jargon.
objectives_summary: Produce professional video to help build their business or blog.
Understand the video making process so that they can effectively outsource it.

items.title: How to make a podcast: The Do Podcasts Course
items.headline: Simple and easy to follow podcasting course to help you start your show today!
objectives_summary: Create your own podcast from start to finish.
Get our Do Podcasts framework to organize your show.
Learn how to put your podcast on iTunes, iHeart, Spotify and other platforms.

items.title: Web Video Editing and Production (Camtasia, PPT, Audacity)
items.headline: Discover the Tools and Processes to capture, edit, produce and sell videos and create video marketing and udemy courses
objectives_summary: Capture videos on your desktop
Edit a video file with Camtasia
Adjust audio with Audacity

items.title: Kindle Formatting and Direct Publishing for Authors
items.headline: Pre Formatted Microsoft Word Kindle Publishing Template Included
objectives_summary: You will have access to a downloadable pre formatted Microsoft Word document Kindle template.
You will have access to downloadable resources that will help you market and promote your book.
You will see a video demonstration showing you the exact process for uploading your book to KDP.

items.title: How to Podcast Without Wasting Your Time
items.headline: The course on creating and scaling your podcast in the most efficient manner possible.
objectives_summary: How to create and scale a podcast in the most efficient manner possible.
How to find A-list guests for your show.
How to ensure that your show fits into a market niche.

items.title: Self-Publishing Mastery
items.headline: Build your own profitable Self-Publishing Business with Kindle eBooks and Amazon CreateSpace Paperbacks!
objectives_summary: Self Publish a book or books to the Amazon Kindle and Amazon CreateSpace platform. You will learn how to create valuable content with a compelling cover and description. Each step is described in detail and will give you the tools and resources to build your own successful self publishing business.

items.title: Write, Publish and Sell Your Book With Lightning Speed
items.headline: Learn how to write your book quickly using a focus group, choose the best publishing approach and use media to market it
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will know the different publishing approaches and be able to decide which is best for you
By the end of this course, you will know how to get an agent
By the end of this course, you will know how to write a query letter and book proposal

items.title: NFT (Non-Fungible Tokens) for Beginners: Theory and Practice
items.headline: Learn about Non-Fungible Tokens, it's relation with Blockchain and Smart contracts. Create buy and sell your own NFTs.
objectives_summary: Fundamentals about NFT (Non-Fungible Tokens)
A short understanding about Blockchain technology
A short understanding about Smart Contracts technology

items.title: Publishing Beyond Kindle - Grow Your audience & Your Profits
items.headline: Learn how to publish your existing books on other book platforms. Expand your audience and maximize your profits.
objectives_summary: Publish your content on other platforms in addition to Kindle.  You will have the knowledge and ability to upload to: Google Play, iBooks, Kobo and e-sentral.
Utilize your pre existing ebooks (and any future ebooks) to develop multiple revenue streams at no additional expense to you.
Cut out the middle man (book aggregators) to do what is actually a very simple and quick task.

items.title: Publishing for Writers I

visible_instructors.name: Thomas
visible_instructors.title: Thomas Bell
visible_instructors.job_title: Writer, Publishing Consultant, and Web Developer

items.headline: A Comprehensive Introduction to the Modern Publishing Landscape: Publishing, Self-Publishing, Ebooks, Audiobooks, & More
objectives_summary: Clearly define what successful book publication means to you.
Identify and evaluate the many publishing outlets and formats -- from traditional to revolutionary -- available to you today.
Choose the publishing outlets and formats best suited to you and your book.

items.title: Professional stage lighting. Light operator: Busking
items.headline: Become a profesional concert and festival light operator
objectives_summary: Create, design and prepare a professional busing lightshow for a concert, festivall or theater situation.
